title: Treatment of the Chemically Dependent Homeless: Theory and Implementation in Fourteen American Projects. Edited by K. J. Conrad, C. I. Hultman and J. S. Lyons. (Pp. 249; £29.95.) Haworth Press: New York. 1993.
